about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

name: python-framel
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: python-framel
  version: 8.41.3
source:
  patches: null
  sha256: 55107d6be9b989181f3d41b6db9f6e20013959955500e6c5607717cfcffbefeb
  url: https://git.ligo.org/virgo/virgoapp/Fr/-/archive/v8r41p3/Fr-v8r41p3.tar.gz
build:
  ignore_run_exports:
    - python
  number: 0
  string: py36h5f094cf_0
requirements:
  build:
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h0d85af4_4
    - c-ares 1.17.2 h0d85af4_0

    - cctools_osx-64 949.0.1 h6407bdd_22

    - clang-11 11.1.0 default_he082bbe_1
    - clang_osx-64 11.1.0 hb91bd55_3
    - clangxx 11.1.0 default_he082bbe_1
    - cmake 3.21.3 hdbd2f3e_0
    - compiler-rt 11.1.0 h654b07c_0
    - compiler-rt_osx-64 11.1.0 h8c5fa43_0
    - expat 2.4.1 he49afe7_0
    - krb5 1.19.2 h289aae4_2
    - ld64_osx-64 530 he8994da_21
    - ldid 2.1.2 h6a69015_3
    - libclang-cpp11.1 11.1.0 default_he082bbe_1
    - libcurl 7.79.1 h97da3c1_1
    - libcxx 12.0.1 habf9029_0
    - libedit 3.1.20191231 h0678c8f_2
    - libev 4.33 haf1e3a3_1
    - libllvm11 11.1.0 hd011deb_2
    - libllvm12 12.0.1 hd011deb_2
    - libnghttp2 1.43.0 hfd382f3_1
    - libssh2 1.10.0 hd3787cc_2
    - libuv 1.42.0 h0d85af4_0
    - libzlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - llvm-tools 11.1.0 hd011deb_2
    - lz4-c 1.9.3 he49afe7_1
    - make 4.3 h22f3db7_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - openssl 3.0.0 h0d85af4_1
    - rhash 1.4.1 h35c211d_0
    - tapi 1100.0.11 h9ce4665_0
    - tk 8.6.11 h5dbffcc_1
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - zstd 1.5.0 h582d3a0_0
  host:
    - ca-certificates 2021.5.30 h033912b_0
    - libblas 3.9.0 11_osx64_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 11_osx64_openblas
    - libcxx 12.0.1 habf9029_0
    - libffi 3.4.2 he49afe7_4
    - libframel 8.41.3 h0d85af4_0
    - libgfortran 5.0.0 9_3_0_h6c81a4c_23
    - libgfortran5 9.3.0 h6c81a4c_23
    - liblapack 3.9.0 11_osx64_openblas
    - libopenblas 0.3.17 openmp_h3351f45_1
    - libzlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - llvm-openmp 12.0.1 hda6cdc1_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - numpy 1.18.5 py36hdc5ca10_0
    - openssl 1.1.1l h0d85af4_0
    - python 3.6.13 haf480d7_2_cpython
    - python_abi 3.6 2_cp36m
    - readline 8.1 h05e3726_0
    - sqlite 3.36.0 h23a322b_2
    - tk 8.6.11 h5dbffcc_1
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
  run:
    - libframel 8.41.3 h0d85af4_0
    - numpy >=1.18.5,<2.0a0
    - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
    - python_abi 3.6.* *_cp36m
test:
  commands:
    - 'python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal;
      import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path(''data'') / ''test.gwf''),
      ''D1''); framel.frputvect(''test2.gwf'', [{''name'': ''A1:TEST'', ''data'':
      indata[0], ''start'': indata[1], ''dx'': indata[3], ''x_unit'': indata[4], ''y_unit'':
      indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d(''test2.gwf'', ''A1:TEST''); assert_array_equal(indata[0],
      indata2[0], ''read-write data mismatch''); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:],
      ''read-write metadata mismatch''; "

      '
    - python -m pip check
  imports:
    - framel
  requires:
    - pip
  source_files:
    - data/test.gwf
about:
  description: 'A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave

    Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.

    The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation

    including file input/output.

    This package provides the python bindings.'
  home: http://lappweb.in2p3.fr/virgo/FrameL/
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: LIGO/Virgo Frame Library
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: framel
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - anthchirp
    - duncanmmacleod
    - rhyspoulton

about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

commands: python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal; import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path('data') / 'test.gwf'), 'D1'); framel.frputvect('test2.gwf', [{'name': 'A1:TEST', 'data': indata[0], 'start': indata[1], 'dx': indata[3], 'x_unit': indata[4], 'y_unit': indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d('test2.gwf', 'A1:TEST'); assert_array_equal(indata[0], indata2[0], 'read-write data mismatch'); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:], 'read-write metadata mismatch'; "
